Keywords: Excalibur , New Mutants , Robot , X-Men
Real Name: Warlock
Special Powers
SELF OR SELF FRIENDS?: Perplex but only to target a friendly character with a shared keyword. When he uses it, after resolutions, choose a standard power printed on the target character's card and Warlock can use the chosen power until your next turn.
SELF WILL SAVE YOU, FRIEND: FREE: Roll a d6. This turn, Warlock has Giant Reach: X where X is the result.
